heroDescription: Discover how leading companies have reduced costs, accelerated processes, and demonstrated their ESG impact with the ProcureData platform.

emptyState.title: We're still writing stories in this sector
emptyState.description: Want to be the first company to transform your industry with ProcureData?

gigafactory-north.title: Industrial Homologation Automation
gigafactory-north.description: From 22 days to 48 hours in the Tier 2 supplier homologation process.
gigafactory-north.challenge: The onboarding process for metallurgical Tier 2 suppliers took an average of 22 days. Each new supplier required manual validations of ISO 9001, IATF 16949, and occupational safety certifications. The procurement team dedicated more than 40% of their time to repetitive administrative tasks.
gigafactory-north.solution: Implementation of the 'Flash Homologation 24h' service combined with Digital Passports verified on the Pontus-X network. Suppliers upload their certifications once, and GigaFactory accesses the Verified Passport in real-time, eliminating duplicate validations.
gigafactory-north.ariaQuote: Automation through ODRL policies enabled contracts to be signed automatically when security requirements were met. The procurement team now dedicates its time to strategic negotiation, not chasing documents.

olivetrust-coop.title: ESG Traceability for Export
olivetrust-coop.description: Water footprint certification for access to the German market with premium pricing.
olivetrust-coop.challenge: OliveTrust needed to demonstrate the actual water footprint of their farms in Jaén to comply with the German distributor Edeka's tender requirements. Each traditional certification cost €3,500 and took 45 days to obtain.
olivetrust-coop.solution: Automated capture of IoT irrigation data from field sensors and blockchain notarization of origin certificates. The Olive Oil Digital Passport includes traceability from the farm to the point of sale.
olivetrust-coop.ariaQuote: The Digital Supplier Passport eliminated the need for 5 redundant physical audits. Now every European buyer accesses the same verified data at no additional cost to the cooperative.

urbandeliver-bcn.title: Instant Scope 3 Reporting
urbandeliver-bcn.description: Generation of Scope 3 emissions report for access to green bank credit.
urbandeliver-bcn.challenge: UrbanDeliver needed to audit the actual emissions of their logistics fleet to access a €2M green credit from the Green Finance Bank. Manual reports took weeks and were not accepted by the financial institution.
urbandeliver-bcn.solution: Integration of the Universal ERP Connector to extract real fleet consumption telemetry (OBD-II) and automatic generation of CSRD report with certified Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions.
urbandeliver-bcn.ariaQuote: Thanks to the direct telemetry integrated with ProcureData, the Green Finance Bank approved the green credit in record time. Data transparency eliminated the usual 12 weeks of due diligence.

alianza-social-hub.title: Social Impact Measurement
alianza-social-hub.description: Verified demonstration of social return on investment from ethical suppliers.
alianza-social-hub.challenge: Alianza Social Hub brings together 15 sheltered employment centers. The main problem: Large corporations with quota requirements needed to demonstrate the real impact of every euro invested in ethical suppliers. CSR departments could only report expenses, not the social value generated.
alianza-social-hub.solution: Implementation of the SROI Metrics Dashboard with three pillars: 1) Impact Monetization with calculation of savings on public subsidies. 2) Anti-Social-Washing Guarantee with verified DID on Pontus-X. 3) Automatic CSRD Reporting for Sustainability Reports.
alianza-social-hub.ariaQuote: We have verified that 100% of suppliers comply with employment quotas. For every euro invested, €3.8 of social value is generated. 78% of investment is reinvested in the local economy.

biomed-hospital.title: Guaranteed Care Continuity
biomed-hospital.description: Predictive maintenance of MRI equipment with anonymized GDPR-compliant telemetry.
biomed-hospital.challenge: The hospital suffered unexpected downtime on its Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) equipment, costing €15,000 per day of inactivity and delaying critical surgeries. No visibility into the actual equipment status and no way to share logs without exposing patient data (GDPR).
biomed-hospital.solution: Implementation of Edge Functions to anonymize patient data while sending magnet error logs in real-time to the supplier EcoTech Industrial. ML predictive model detects failures 72h in advance. Automatic alerts to the approved spare parts supplier.
biomed-hospital.ariaQuote: Thanks to the IDS connector, the hospital shared technical logs without exposing any personal patient data. The predictive model detects failures 72h in advance, avoiding unexpected downtime.

globalretail-prime.title: Supply Chain Ethical Audit
globalretail-prime.description: Verification of SA8000 compliance across 200 Asian textile suppliers.
globalretail-prime.challenge: A retail multinational needed to ensure that its 200 textile suppliers in Asia complied with SA8000 standards to avoid reputational risks. Expensive on-site audits, falsifiable documents, and no guarantee of continuity between inspections.
globalretail-prime.solution: Implementation of the Digital Supplier Passport with audits digitally signed by external certifiers. ODRL policies allow only the ethics committee to access sensitive details. Blockchain traceability guarantees certificate integrity.
globalretail-prime.ariaQuote: Blockchain traceability on Pontus-X guarantees that the SA8000 certificate has not been tampered with since its issuance at origin. Zero ethical incidents in the annual audit and +25% consumer trust.

ecovolt-manufacturing.title: Automated Renewable Energy Purchasing
ecovolt-manufacturing.description: Instant settlement of Guarantees of Origin via Smart Contracts and EUROe.
ecovolt-manufacturing.challenge: An aluminum plant needed to certify that 100% of its consumption was renewable to obtain tax benefits. The reconciliation of invoices and Guarantees of Origin (GO) took months, losing tax incentives.
ecovolt-manufacturing.solution: Automation via Smart Contracts and EUROe. IoT meter reports consumption in real-time. Smart Contract automatically purchases GO certificates and pays in the same block. Instant accounting reconciliation and automatic Carbon Neutral seal.
ecovolt-manufacturing.ariaQuote: Payment in EUROe allows the value transfer and energy certificate to occur in the same blockchain block. Instant accounting reconciliation, from months to 12 seconds.

sky-aero-systems.title: EN9100 Aerospace Certification
sky-aero-systems.description: Automatic validation of EN9100 certificates from 120 global suppliers of critical parts.
sky-aero-systems.challenge: Sky Aero Systems faced a 3-month verification backlog for aerospace-grade component suppliers. Manual cross-checking of EN9100 certifications against IAQG OASIS database was error-prone and resource-intensive.
sky-aero-systems.solution: Automated certificate validation pipeline connecting IAQG OASIS directly to ProcureData's Digital Passport system. Real-time status updates and automatic alerts for expiring certifications.
sky-aero-systems.ariaQuote: Connecting our supplier homologation to verified industry databases reduced our certification risk to near-zero. Every critical part now has a verified digital chain of custody.

vinosdoe-elite.title: Zero Fraud in D.O. Exports
vinosdoe-elite.description: Batch and D.O. notarization with dynamic QR linked to geolocation DID.
vinosdoe-elite.challenge: Premium wine exports to Asia were plagued by counterfeiting. Traditional paper certificates were easily falsified, and consumers had no way to verify authenticity.
vinosdoe-elite.solution: Implementation of dynamic QR codes on each bottle linked to a blockchain-verified DID containing GPS coordinates of the vineyard, harvest date, and D.O. council verification.
vinosdoe-elite.ariaQuote: Each bottle now tells its authentic story from vine to glass. Counterfeiters cannot replicate the blockchain verification that consumers check with their phones.

pharmacold-logistix.title: Cold Chain Integrity
pharmacold-logistix.description: Smart Contracts block payment if sensors detect temperature >8°C for +10min.
pharmacold-logistix.challenge: Pharmaceutical cold chain logistics suffered €2M annual losses from temperature excursions that went undetected until destination. Payment disputes and product recalls were common.
pharmacold-logistix.solution: IoT temperature sensors continuously stream data to smart contracts. If temperature exceeds 8°C for more than 10 minutes, payment is automatically blocked and stakeholders are notified.
pharmacold-logistix.ariaQuote: Payment is now tied to verified cold chain compliance. Suppliers are incentivized to maintain proper temperatures, and we have indisputable evidence for any disputes.

portbcn-smart-trade.title: Instant Digital Customs
portbcn-smart-trade.description: Webhooks connection with port systems for instant KYB validation.
portbcn-smart-trade.challenge: Container processing at port took 48-72 hours due to manual document verification. Storage fees accumulated, and perishable goods suffered quality degradation.
portbcn-smart-trade.solution: Direct webhook integration with port authority systems for instant KYB verification. Digital supplier passports pre-validated before vessel arrival.
portbcn-smart-trade.ariaQuote: Containers now clear customs in hours, not days. The integration with port systems has transformed our supply chain velocity.

ayuntamiento-etico.title: Transparent Public Procurement
ayuntamiento-etico.description: SROI Dashboard to verify disability quota of bidders in real-time.
ayuntamiento-etico.challenge: Public procurement required verification of social clauses, but municipalities lacked tools to verify bidder compliance with disability employment quotas before contract award.
ayuntamiento-etico.solution: Real-time SROI dashboard that queries verified DIDs of bidding companies to confirm disability employment quota compliance. Automatic disqualification of non-compliant bidders.
ayuntamiento-etico.ariaQuote: We can now guarantee citizens that every euro of public money goes to companies that truly meet social criteria. Verification happens in seconds, not weeks.

purelithium-sourcing.title: Conflict-Free Minerals CSRD
purelithium-sourcing.description: Tier 3 lithium traceability with ODRL signature of ethical use policies.
purelithium-sourcing.challenge: Proving that lithium did not come from areas with child labor exploitation for automotive clients' CSRD reporting was nearly impossible with traditional audit methods.
purelithium-sourcing.solution: Tier 3 supplier traceability through ODRL Governance. Signing of 'Ethical Use' policies at every link in the supply chain, from mine to battery cell.
purelithium-sourcing.ariaQuote: Data sovereignty enables tracing ethics from the mine to the electric car. Every gram of lithium has a verifiable history.

fastfashion-trace.title: Circular Fashion Without Greenwashing
fastfashion-trace.description: PLM synchronization with textile composition certificates for 1M garments.
fastfashion-trace.challenge: Fashion brands faced regulatory pressure to prove garment composition claims. Manual certificate tracking across thousands of SKUs was impossible at scale.
fastfashion-trace.solution: Direct PLM integration that syncs textile composition certificates at the SKU level. Blockchain verification ensures label claims match actual materials.
fastfashion-trace.ariaQuote: Every garment label is now backed by verified composition data. Regulators and consumers can trust our sustainability claims.

invoicetrust-b2b.title: Factoring with Blockchain Score
invoicetrust-b2b.description: Immutable solvency score based on ODRL contract compliance history.
invoicetrust-b2b.challenge: SMEs struggled to access factoring services due to limited credit history. Traditional credit scoring failed to capture their actual payment reliability.
invoicetrust-b2b.solution: Blockchain-based credit scoring that aggregates verified ODRL contract compliance history. Immutable payment track record accessible to factoring providers.
invoicetrust-b2b.ariaQuote: Our payment history is now our strongest asset. Factoring providers trust the immutable blockchain record of our contract compliance.

gridflow-energy.title: Energy Surplus Management
gridflow-energy.description: Daily settlement of micro-payments for energy between industrial communities.
gridflow-energy.challenge: Industrial parks with solar installations couldn't efficiently trade surplus energy between buildings. Manual billing was impractical for micro-transactions.
gridflow-energy.solution: Automated micro-payment settlement for peer-to-peer energy trading within industrial communities. Smart contracts handle billing at 15-minute intervals.
gridflow-energy.ariaQuote: Our industrial park has become a self-balancing energy community. Surplus solar from one building automatically powers its neighbors.

ailabs-research.title: AI Training with Synthetic Data
ailabs-research.description: Synthetic datasets with high statistical fidelity without real data leakage.
ailabs-research.challenge: AI labs needed diverse training data but faced privacy constraints. Real production data couldn't be shared, limiting model development.
ailabs-research.solution: Synthetic data generation that preserves statistical properties while guaranteeing zero real data leakage. ODRL policies govern synthetic data usage rights.
ailabs-research.ariaQuote: We can now train models on statistically valid synthetic data without any privacy concerns. Development velocity has tripled.

helios-fields.title: Solar Predictive Maintenance
helios-fields.description: IoT telemetry of 1M daily readings to detect thermal anomalies in inverters.
helios-fields.challenge: Solar farm inverter failures caused significant production losses. Reactive maintenance meant problems were discovered only after energy generation dropped.
helios-fields.solution: High-frequency IoT monitoring with ML-based anomaly detection. Thermal signatures predict inverter failures 2 weeks before occurrence.
helios-fields.ariaQuote: We now fix inverters before they fail. Predictive maintenance has virtually eliminated unplanned downtime across our solar portfolio.

aeolus-wind.title: Programmable PPAs with Smart Contracts
aeolus-wind.description: Instant settlement of PPA contracts via Smart Contracts and EUROe.
aeolus-wind.challenge: Power Purchase Agreement reconciliation involved months of back-and-forth between energy generators and offtakers. Cash flow delays impacted project financing.
aeolus-wind.solution: Smart contract-based PPA settlement that executes automatically based on verified generation data. Payment in EUROe provides instant settlement.
aeolus-wind.ariaQuote: Our PPA settlements now happen in real-time. Cash flow predictability has transformed our ability to finance new wind projects.

h2-pure.title: Green Hydrogen Certification
h2-pure.description: Immutable digital GO certifying the wind farm-electrolyzer link.
h2-pure.challenge: Green hydrogen premiums required proof of renewable electricity source. Tracing the specific wind farm powering an electrolyzer was manually intensive.
h2-pure.solution: Digital Guarantee of Origin that creates an immutable blockchain link between specific wind turbines and electrolyzer production batches.
h2-pure.ariaQuote: Buyers pay premium prices because they can verify exactly which wind turbines produced the electricity for their hydrogen.

poligono-ecolink.title: Energy Community Marketplace
poligono-ecolink.description: ODRL governance for real-time solar surplus exchange between facilities.
poligono-ecolink.challenge: Industrial parks wanted to share solar energy but lacked governance frameworks for fair allocation and billing between participating companies.
poligono-ecolink.solution: ODRL-based governance policies that automate energy allocation, pricing, and settlement for community solar sharing.
poligono-ecolink.ariaQuote: Our industrial community now operates as a single energy entity. Every participant benefits from shared solar infrastructure.

gridflex-demand.title: Smart Grid Flexibility Certificates
gridflex-demand.description: Smart Alerts activating selective disconnection protocols with EUROe incentives.
gridflex-demand.challenge: Grid operators needed demand response mechanisms but lacked verifiable proof of load curtailment for flexibility payments.
gridflex-demand.solution: Certified flexibility response with blockchain verification. Smart alerts trigger load shedding, and verified response earns EUROe incentives.
gridflex-demand.ariaQuote: Our flexibility is now a verified asset. Grid operators trust our response because it's blockchain-certified.

bateria-hub.title: Energy Arbitrage with AI
bateria-hub.description: AI algorithms predict pool prices to automate energy buying/selling.
bateria-hub.challenge: Battery storage operators missed optimal trading windows due to manual decision-making. Price prediction and execution timing were suboptimal.
bateria-hub.solution: AI-driven price prediction with automated smart contract execution for optimal charge/discharge cycles based on spot market prices.
bateria-hub.ariaQuote: Our battery systems now trade autonomously. AI captures arbitrage opportunities that human traders would miss.

bioheat-district.title: RED III Biomass Traceability
bioheat-district.description: DID per batch with logging geolocation to certify sustainable forest clearing.
bioheat-district.challenge: RED III compliance required proof that biomass came from sustainable forestry. Paper-based chain of custody was easily falsified.
bioheat-district.solution: Per-batch DID with GPS coordinates of logging sites. Blockchain verification of sustainable forestry certification at source.
bioheat-district.ariaQuote: Every ton of biomass has a verified origin. RED III auditors can trace our fuel back to specific forest plots.

turbine-chain.title: Green Steel for Wind Turbines
turbine-chain.description: Consolidation of Scope 3 emissions from 15 steel suppliers for CSRD reporting.
turbine-chain.challenge: Wind turbine manufacturers needed verified Scope 3 data from steel suppliers but faced fragmented data from 15+ tier-2 suppliers.
turbine-chain.solution: Consolidated Scope 3 dashboard that aggregates verified emissions data from all steel suppliers in a single CSRD-compliant report.
turbine-chain.ariaQuote: We won a major turbine contract because we could prove our steel supply chain's carbon footprint. Verified data is a competitive advantage.

aquapower-nexus.title: Water-Energy Nexus Management
aquapower-nexus.description: ODRL policies regulate water use between irrigation and electricity generation in real-time.
aquapower-nexus.challenge: Competing demands for water between agricultural irrigation and hydroelectric generation required complex allocation decisions.
aquapower-nexus.solution: ODRL policies that dynamically allocate water rights based on electricity prices, agricultural demand, and environmental flow requirements.
aquapower-nexus.ariaQuote: Water allocation is now optimized in real-time. Farmers and power generators both benefit from smarter resource management.

smartcharge-ev.title: Guarantee of Origin for EV Users
smartcharge-ev.description: API queries Notary Node to display solar/wind origin in charging app.
smartcharge-ev.challenge: EV drivers wanted proof that their charging energy came from renewable sources, but existing apps couldn't verify energy origin.
smartcharge-ev.solution: Charging app integration that queries the Notary Node to display verified renewable origin for each charging session.
smartcharge-ev.ariaQuote: Our drivers see exactly where their energy comes from. Proof of renewable charging increases customer loyalty.

fiber-loop.title: Post-Consumer Fiber Traceability
fiber-loop.description: Blockchain notarization of fiber weight and quality at each transformation to avoid greenwashing fines.
fiber-loop.challenge: Extended Producer Responsibility regulations required proof of recycled content, but tracking fiber through multiple transformation stages was impossible.
fiber-loop.solution: Blockchain notarization at each transformation stage. Weight and quality data creates auditable chain of custody from post-consumer collection to new textile.
fiber-loop.ariaQuote: We can prove exactly how much recycled content is in every garment. EPR compliance is now automated.

rare-earth-recover.title: Urban Mining of Rare Earths
rare-earth-recover.description: AI chemical composition datasets to sell to specialized smelters vs generic processors.
rare-earth-recover.challenge: E-waste processors couldn't effectively sort materials for specialized smelters that pay premium prices for specific rare earth compositions.
rare-earth-recover.solution: AI-driven chemical composition analysis that categorizes e-waste batches for sale to specialized smelters at premium prices.
rare-earth-recover.ariaQuote: We now extract 3x more value from the same e-waste stream by matching compositions to the right buyers.

alu-cycle.title: Infinite Aluminum Energy Savings
alu-cycle.description: Smart Contract calculates saved CO2 to issue Energy Savings Certificates (CAEs).
alu-cycle.challenge: Secondary aluminum producers couldn't monetize the 95% energy savings compared to virgin aluminum production.
alu-cycle.solution: Smart contracts that calculate verified CO2 savings and automatically issue Energy Savings Certificates tradeable on environmental markets.
alu-cycle.ariaQuote: Our energy savings are now a revenue stream. CAE certificates monetize our circular economy contribution.

producer-trust.title: Automatic EPR Audit
producer-trust.description: EPR compliance dashboard aggregating data from multiple Data Holders with immutable DID signatures.
producer-trust.challenge: Producer Responsibility Organizations faced annual audit nightmares aggregating data from hundreds of member companies.
producer-trust.solution: Automated EPR compliance dashboard that aggregates verified data from member companies with immutable DID signatures.
producer-trust.ariaQuote: Annual audits that took months now complete in days. All member data is pre-verified with immutable signatures.

eco-orchestrator.title: SCRAP Coordination
eco-orchestrator.description: Multi-Tenant RLS ensures each partner sees only their quota while SCRAP sees the aggregate.
eco-orchestrator.challenge: Collective compliance schemes needed to share aggregate data while keeping individual member data confidential.
eco-orchestrator.solution: Multi-tenant RLS architecture where members see only their own data while the scheme operator sees verified aggregates.
eco-orchestrator.ariaQuote: Member confidentiality is preserved while we maintain complete visibility of collective performance.

raw-market.title: Secondary Raw Materials Marketplace
raw-market.description: ODRL policies ensure buyers use waste for recycling, not landfill.
raw-market.challenge: Waste producers selling materials for recycling had no guarantee that buyers wouldn't illegally divert to landfill.
raw-market.solution: ODRL policies attached to material sales that enforce recycling end-use. Violation triggers automatic penalties.
raw-market.ariaQuote: We sell with confidence knowing our materials will be recycled. ODRL policies make buyers accountable.

battery-life.title: EV Battery Second Life
battery-life.description: Immutable Audit Logs certify usage history to decide recycling vs stationary storage.
battery-life.challenge: Determining whether EV batteries should be recycled or repurposed for stationary storage required access to reliable usage history.
battery-life.solution: Immutable audit logs from vehicle BMS that certify complete charging history. AI algorithms determine optimal second-life application.
battery-life.ariaQuote: Every battery's history is transparent. We can accurately assess remaining capacity for second-life applications.

urban-mining.title: Ethical Recycled Gold Certification
urban-mining.description: Blockchain proof of integrity linking input batch (waste) with output (ingot).
urban-mining.challenge: Recycled gold struggled to command ethical premiums because buyers couldn't verify the material actually came from e-waste rather than mining.
urban-mining.solution: Complete chain of custody from e-waste collection to refined ingot. Blockchain links input waste batches to output gold bars.
urban-mining.ariaQuote: Our gold carries verified proof of its recycled origin. Luxury brands pay premium prices for certified ethical metal.

waste-to-value.title: Zero Landfill Audit
waste-to-value.description: Automatic reconciliation between factory output data and recycler intake via Webhooks.
waste-to-value.challenge: Companies claiming zero-waste-to-landfill couldn't prove it. Manual reconciliation between waste generators and recyclers was incomplete.
waste-to-value.solution: Webhook integration that automatically reconciles waste output with verified recycler intake. Any discrepancy triggers immediate investigation.
waste-to-value.ariaQuote: Every kilogram is accounted for. Our zero-waste claim is backed by continuous automated verification.

green-gov-circular.title: Local Plastic Public Procurement
green-gov-circular.description: DID Web3 Validator confirms plastic comes from the local recycling plant.
green-gov-circular.challenge: Municipalities wanted to prioritize locally recycled plastic but couldn't verify supplier claims about material origin.
green-gov-circular.solution: DID Web3 validation that confirms plastic batches originated from the local municipal recycling facility.
green-gov-circular.ariaQuote: Public money now verifiably supports local circular economy. Every purchase is traceable to our own recycling plant.

avocado-trust.title: USA Phytosanitary Export
avocado-trust.description: IoT trap sensors generate USDA pre-certificate with blockchain evidence.
avocado-trust.challenge: Avocado exports to the USA faced high rejection rates due to pest detection issues. Manual certification was slow and unreliable.
avocado-trust.solution: IoT pest trap sensors continuously monitor orchards. Clean readings auto-generate USDA-format phytosanitary pre-certificates with blockchain evidence.
avocado-trust.ariaQuote: Our containers clear US customs on first inspection. Continuous IoT monitoring provides the evidence USDA requires.

olive-origin.title: D.O. Jaén Brand Sovereignty
olive-origin.description: Digital Passport links mill batch with GPS harvest coordinates via DID.
olive-origin.challenge: Denomination of Origin olive oil premiums were threatened by fraudulent mixing with non-D.O. oil that couldn't be detected.
olive-origin.solution: Digital Passport that links each oil batch to verified GPS coordinates of olive harvest via DID. Mill processing creates immutable chain.
olive-origin.ariaQuote: Every drop of D.O. Jaén oil has verifiable origin. Buyers pay premium prices because authenticity is guaranteed.

zero-chem-wine.title: Zero Residue Wine Certification
zero-chem-wine.description: 36 months without synthetic chemistry certified with nitrate sensors and digital passport.
zero-chem-wine.challenge: Organic wine certifications were point-in-time audits. Continuous verification of zero synthetic input was impossible with traditional methods.
zero-chem-wine.solution: Continuous soil and plant sensor monitoring for 36 months. Nitrate and chemical levels create verifiable zero-residue certification.
zero-chem-wine.ariaQuote: Three years of continuous monitoring proves our zero-residue claim. Buyers trust data, not just annual audits.

citrus-check.title: Multi-Country MRL Validation
citrus-check.description: Automatic cross-checking of phytosanitary applications against regulations from 150 countries.
citrus-check.challenge: Citrus exporters needed to comply with different Maximum Residue Limits across 150 destination countries. Manual compliance checking was error-prone.
citrus-check.solution: Automated MRL compliance engine that cross-checks spray application records against destination country regulations in real-time.
citrus-check.ariaQuote: We know instantly which markets our citrus can enter. Compliance is verified before shipment, not at customs.

berry-water.title: Water Footprint Certification
berry-water.description: Moisture probes and flow meters notarize savings for GlobalG.A.P. certification.
berry-water.challenge: Berry producers needed to prove water efficiency for GlobalG.A.P. certification but lacked continuous measurement infrastructure.
berry-water.solution: IoT moisture probes and flow meters provide continuous water use data. Blockchain notarization creates auditable efficiency records.
berry-water.ariaQuote: Our water footprint is now continuously certified. GlobalG.A.P. auditors access verified data instead of sampling.

rice-satellite.title: Satellite D.O. Validation
rice-satellite.description: NDVI spectral signature confirms variety and blocks mixing with imported grain.
rice-satellite.challenge: Rice Denomination of Origin fraud through mixing with imported varieties was undetectable with traditional inspection methods.
rice-satellite.solution: Satellite NDVI analysis that identifies specific rice varieties. Spectral signatures block fraudulent mixing with non-D.O. grain.
rice-satellite.ariaQuote: Satellite imagery catches what ground inspections miss. Our D.O. rice is verified from space.

bio-cotton-trace.title: GOTS Cotton Traceability
bio-cotton-trace.description: Chain of custody: Seed → Field → Gin → Bale with unique ID.
bio-cotton-trace.challenge: GOTS organic cotton certification lacked visibility into the complete supply chain from seed to finished bale.
bio-cotton-trace.solution: Complete chain of custody tracking with unique IDs at each transformation: seed, field, ginning, and bale production.
bio-cotton-trace.ariaQuote: Every bale traces back to specific fields. GOTS certification is now backed by complete supply chain visibility.

greenhouse-ai.title: IoT Greenhouses Anti-Mildew
greenhouse-ai.description: AI manages microclimate to prevent fungi without systemic fungicides.
greenhouse-ai.challenge: Greenhouse fungal outbreaks required heavy fungicide use. Residue limits threatened market access and increased costs.
greenhouse-ai.solution: AI-driven microclimate control that prevents fungal conditions from developing. Proactive environmental management eliminates need for systemic fungicides.
greenhouse-ai.ariaQuote: We haven't used systemic fungicides in two years. AI keeps our greenhouses naturally disease-free.

tropical-flash.title: Express Perishables Customs
tropical-flash.description: Digital pre-validation 48h before reduces waste and extends shelf life.
tropical-flash.challenge: Tropical fruit suffered quality degradation during extended customs processing. Manual documentation added 2-3 days to transit time.
tropical-flash.solution: Digital pre-validation 48 hours before arrival. All documentation verified en route, enabling immediate release upon landing.
tropical-flash.ariaQuote: Our fruit arrives fresher because customs clearance happens in hours, not days. Pre-validation is a game-changer.

urban-hydro.title: Km 0 Vertical Farm
urban-hydro.description: Urban hydroponic production with certified renewable LED energy.
urban-hydro.challenge: Urban vertical farms couldn't prove their sustainability claims. LED energy consumption and logistics were questioned by skeptical consumers.
urban-hydro.solution: Complete sustainability certification covering renewable LED energy, water recycling, and zero-transport logistics footprint.
urban-hydro.ariaQuote: Our lettuce travels 5km from farm to table. Renewable energy certificates prove our sustainability from seed to supermarket.

detail.ctaDescription: Discover how ProcureData can transform your procurement processes and demonstrate your ESG impact.
